title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
writer: Phil Lord, Christopher Miller, Judi Barrett
short_cast: Bill Hader, Anna Faris, James Caan, Andy Samberg, Bruce Campbell, Mr. T, Bobb'e J. Thompson, Benjamin Bratt, Neil Patrick Harris, Al Roker
